EmailTemplate.name: 202001_BK_Webinar_SocialFlight_International-Flight-Planning_amr.2.Reminder- Web
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Our international flight planning webinar is this week!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Encore evening presentation by popular demand!
Date: Thursday, January 23, 2020 – 6 p.m. MST
Our special webinar is this week! SocialFlight’s Jeff Simon and his sons flew a three-country five-hour flight from Boston to France in their Bonanza. Joining Jeff is BendixKing’s Steve Pearce, and together discuss considerations when planning and flying international trips, along with tips for using AeroNav <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aeronav-gps-navigators]]> GPS navigators.
- International flight planning - Avionics navigation planning with AeroNav - Weather and safety gear planning - Documentation and landing checklists - Flying with your family - Q&A
Produced in association with SocialFlight.com <[[http://www.socialflight.com/search.php]]>, your webinar registration includes FREE access to information on over 10,000 aviation events, destinations, airport restaurants, contests and more listed on SocialFlight.com, the SocialFlight mobile apps and Local Aviation Event Planner. REGISTER HERE <[[https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/7224166732172785677]]>
